title: Where did the Visitors and Convention Bureau come up with the figure that each tourist in the Wilmington area spends an average of $290 a day?  By my calculations that would require staying in a high cost hotel, eating at full service restaurants, and going to at least 3 or 4 local attractions (Jungle Rapids, the Aquarium, Battleship, etc) every day!  I can\'t imagine the \average\" tourist does this.  I know I don\'t spend that kind of money when I travel.  Are they trying to fool themselves and us into thinking the Convention Center will make money?"
